mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nogari_man_hour.man_hour ( memberSeq, startDt, endDt, totalAmount, manHour, unitPrice, etcPrice, memo,isHoliday, regDt ) VALUES ( #{memberSeq}, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{totalAmount}, #{manHour}, #{unitPrice}, #{etcPrice}, #{memo}, #{isHoliday}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM nogari_man_hour.man_hour WHERE memberSeq = #{memberSeq} OR isHoliday = 'Y' ORDER BY startDt DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE nogari_man_hour.man_hour SET manHour = #{manHour}, unitPrice = #{unitPrice}, etcPrice = #{etcPrice}, memo = #{memo}, modDt = NOW() WHERE manHourSeq = #{manHourSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM nogari_man_hour.man_hour WHERE manHourSeq = #{manHourSeq} AND startDt >= #{startDt} AND endDt <= #{endDt}
